mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where com_num=#{com_num}

select notice_num,notice_title,notice_content,notice_member,notice_date,r from ( select notice_num,notice_title,notice_content,notice_member,notice_date,rownum r from ( select notice_num,notice_title,notice_content,notice_member,notice_date from notice where com_num=#{com_num} order by notice_num desc)) where r<=#{endRow}";

select notice_num,notice_title,notice_content,notice_member,notice_date,r from (select notice_num,notice_title,notice_content,notice_member,notice_date,rownum r from ( select notice_num,notice_title,notice_content,notice_member,notice_date from notice where com_num=#{com_num} order by notice_num desc)) where r>=#{startRow} and r<=#{endRow}
select extract(day from systimestamp-tm) ingDay from ( select to_timestamp((select notice_date from notice where notice_num=#{notice_num}), 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') tm from dual)
